sentence.Network_en: I saw a cadaverous face appear at a small window.
sentence.Network_cn: 我看到小窗口处出现了一张没有血色的面孔.

sentence.Network_en: His face matched his body, and was lean, almost cadaverous.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的身子和脸很相配, 瘦得象骷髅.

sentence.Network_en: By degrees the freshest among them began to cadaverous and saucer - eyed.
sentence.Network_cn: 原先脸色顶鲜明的人,现在也都渐渐变得面无人色,两只眼睛也都显得眍了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(C1)_fang_新浪博客 ... cadaverize 使面如死灰 cadaverous 象尸体的 caddie bag 高尔夫球棒袋.
英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... embryo n 胚胎，萌芽 cadaverous a 死灰色的，苍白的 calligraphy n 书法.
08.05.20-E-history-搜狐博客 ... czar 专制独裁者 cadaverous 惨白的憔悴的 caddy 茶叶罐盒子.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... cadaver n． 尸体 cadaverous adj． 像尸体的，（形容）枯槁的 cadet n． 军校或警官学校的学生.

list.abs: cadaveric blood 尸体血液cadaveric lividity 尸斑cadaveric spasm 死后抽搐
...g 泥炭鞣尸（尸体在泥炭沼泽中因酸性物质的作用，腐败停止发展，皮肤鞣化，这种保存型尸体称为泥炭鞣尸）cadaveric alkaloid 尸碱；尸毒（一类尸体腐败的产物，其化学性质类似生物硷）cadaveric rigidity 尸僵（死亡）
cadaver 尸体cadaveric blood 尸体血液cadaveric lividity 尸斑
死后抽搐(cadaveric spasm)亦称尸首抽搐,是指人或动物于死亡后,其肢体仍然有的小许动作或者抽搐。这种现象可以从肉眼中看见得到。死后抽搐会持续到出现尸僵现象,有时.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin cadaverosus, from cadaver 'corpse'

entry.tran: 形容枯槁的;面色惨白的
entry.def: If you describe someone as cadaverous, you mean they are extremely thin and pale.

example.ex: ...a tall man with a long, cadaverous face.
example.tran: 面色苍白的长脸高个儿男子

means.word_mean: 1. very thin especially from disease or hunger or cold;

sentences.sentence: "a nightmare population of gaunt men and skeletal boys"
"kept life in his wasted frame only by grim concentration"

auth_sentence.content: She is stalked by cadaverous-looking crones that loom from behind doors and haunted by nightmarish visions.
auth_sentence.res_content: She is stalked by cadaverous-looking crones that loom from behind doors and haunted by nightmarish visions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She is stalked by cadaverous-looking crones that loom from behind doors and haunted by nightmarish visions.

means.word_mean: 死人似的, 尸体般的

sentences.en: I saw a cadaverous face appear at a small window.
sentences.cn: 我看到小窗口处出现了一张没有血色的面孔。
